title: Indian hotel with Rs 6 tariff in 1903 is now Rs 1 lakh crore hospitality company
description: Tata Group's Taj Hotels has become the first Indian hospitality company to reach a market cap of Rs 1 lakh crore. The post-Covid travel boom is driving growth in the sector, with IndiGo also seeing significant gains. IHCL's CEO highlights the potential for further growth in Indian tourism due to infrastructure development.
